description: Lists all the impersonation roles for the given WorkMail organization.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The WorkMail organization to which the listed impersonation roles belong.

nested_items.name: Roles
nested_items.description: The list of impersonation roles under the given WorkMail organization.

nested_items.name: ImpersonationRoleId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the impersonation role.

nested_items.name: DateCreated
nested_items.description: The date when the impersonation role was created.

nested_items.name: DateModified
nested_items.description: The date when the impersonation role was last modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next page of results. The value is null when there are no results to return.
